profile.name: Jaesung Ahn
profile.title: Graduate Student · Superconducting Circuit · Quantum Information
profile.tagline: Graduate researcher at Superconducting Quantum Nanoelectronics Lab (SQNL), KAIST, studying superconducting qubits—device physics, high‑fidelity control, and noise characterization for scalable quantum information processing.

projects.title: High fidelity Entangling Gate Optimization
projects.summary: Investigating microwave-activate entangling gates on Transmon qubit.

projects.title: Qubit Noise Explorer
projects.summary: Scripts + analysis for 1/f and TLS noise in transmons.
